00145 #define ESTIMATE0 ((dx>dy) ?       (dx)      :       (dy))
00146 #define ESTIMATE1 ((dx<dy) ? ((dx*14)/10+dy) : ((dy*14)/10+dx) )
00147 #define ESTIMATE2 FLATCOST*( (dx<dy) ? ((dx*14)/10+dy) : ((dy*14)/10+dx) )
00148 #define ESTIMATEn ((int)(FLATCOST*sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)))
00149 #define ESTIMATEC ( ( (dx<dy) ? (TRAVELCOST_BUMPY * (dx * 14 + dy * 10) / 10) : ( TRAVELCOST_BUMPY * (dy * 14 + dx * 10) / 10 ) ) )
00150 //#define ESTIMATEC (((dx<dy) ? ( (TRAVELCOST_FLAT * dx * 14) / 10 + dy) : (TRAVELCOST_FLAT * dy * 14 ) / 10 + dx) ) )
00151 #define ESTIMATE ESTIMATEC

00187 // Note, the closed list is maintained as a doubly-linked list;
00188 // it's a regular queue, essentially, as we always add to the end
00189 // and remove from the front
00190 
00191 // pNext[0] is used for the next pointers
00192 // and pNext[1] is used for prev pointers
00193 
00194 /*
00195 #define ClosedListAdd( pNew ) \
00196 {\
00197       pNew->pNext[0] = pClosedHead;\
00198       pNew->pNext[1] = pClosedHead->pNext[1];\
00199       pClosedHead->pNext[1]->pNext[0] = pNew;\
00200       pClosedHead->pNext[1] = pNew;\
00201       pNew->iLocation = -1;\
00202       iClosedListSize++;\
00203 }
00204 
00205 #define ClosedListGet( pNew )\
00206 {\
00207       if (queRequests<QPOOLNDX)\
00208       {\
00209             pNew = pathQ + (queRequests);\
00210             queRequests++;\
00211             memset( pNew->pNext, 0, sizeof( path_t *) * ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL );\
00212             pNew->bLevel = RandomSkipListLevel();\
00213       }\
00214       else if (iClosedListSize > 0)\
00215       {\
00216             pNew = pClosedHead->pNext[0];\
00217             pNew->pNext[1]->pNext[0] = pNew->pNext[0];\
00218             pNew->pNext[0]->pNext[1] = pNew->pNext[1];\
00219             iClosedListSize--;\
00220             queRequests++;\
00221             memset( pNew->pNext, 0, sizeof( path_t *) * ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL );\
00222             pNew->bLevel = RandomSkipListLevel();\
00223       }\
00224       else\
00225       {\
00226             pNew = NULL;\
00227       }\
00228 }
00229 */

00234       pNew->pNext[0] = pClosedHead->pNext[0];\
00235       pClosedHead->pNext[0] = pNew;\
00236       pNew->iLocation = -1;\
00237       iClosedListSize++;\
00238 }

00292       }\
00293       else\
00294       {\
00295             pNew = NULL;\
00296       }\
00297 }
00298 */
00299 
00300 #define SkipListRemoveHead()\
00301 {\
00302       pDel = pQueueHead->pNext[0];\
00303       for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < __min( bSkipListLevel, pDel->bLevel ); iLoop++)\
00304       {\
00305             pQueueHead->pNext[iLoop] = pDel->pNext[iLoop];\
00306       }\
00307       iSkipListSize--;\
00308       ClosedListAdd( pDel );\
00309 }
00310 
00311 #define SkipListInsert( pNew )\
00312 {\
00313       pCurr = pQueueHead;\
00314       uiCost = TOTALCOST( pNew );\
00315       memset( pUpdate, 0, MAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL * sizeof( path_t *) );\
00316       for (iCurrLevel = bSkipListLevel - 1; iCurrLevel >= 0; iCurrLevel--)\
00317       {\
00318             pNext = pCurr->pNext[iCurrLevel];\
00319             while (pNext)\
00320             {\
00321                   if ( uiCost > TOTALCOST( pNext ) || (uiCost == TOTALCOST( pNext ) && FARTHER( pNew, pNext ) ) )\
00322                   {\
00323                         pCurr = pNext;\
00324                         pNext = pCurr->pNext[iCurrLevel];\
00325                   }\
00326                   else\
00327                   {\
00328                         break;\
00329                   }\
00330             }\
00331             pUpdate[iCurrLevel] = pCurr;\
00332       }\
00333       pCurr = pCurr->pNext[0];\
00334       for (iCurrLevel = 0; iCurrLevel < pNew->bLevel; iCurrLevel++)\
00335       {\
00336             if (!(pUpdate[iCurrLevel]))\
00337             {\
00338                   break;\
00339             }\
00340             pNew->pNext[iCurrLevel] = pUpdate[iCurrLevel]->pNext[iCurrLevel];\
00341             pUpdate[iCurrLevel]->pNext[iCurrLevel] = pNew;\
00342       }\
00343       iSkipListSize++;\
00344       if (iSkipListSize > iSkipListLevelLimit[bSkipListLevel])\
00345       {\
00346             pCurr = pQueueHead;\
00347             pNext = pQueueHead->pNext[bSkipListLevel - 1];\
00348             while( pNext )\
00349             {\
00350                   if (pNext->bLevel > bSkipListLevel)\
00351                   {\
00352                         pCurr->pNext[bSkipListLevel] = pNext;\
00353                         pCurr = pNext;\
00354                   }\
00355                   pNext = pNext->pNext[bSkipListLevel - 1];\
00356             }\
00357             pCurr->pNext[bSkipListLevel] = pNext;\
00358             bSkipListLevel++;\
00359       }\
00360 }
00361

00435 INT8 RandomSkipListLevel( void )
00436 {
00437       INT8 bLevel = 1;
00438 
00439       while( Random( 4 ) == 0 && bLevel < iMaxSkipListLevel - 1)
00440       {
00441             bLevel++;
00442       }
00443       return( bLevel );
00444 }
00445 
00446 BOOLEAN InitPathAI( void )
00447 {
00448       pathQ = (path_t *) MemAlloc( ABSMAX_PATHQ * sizeof( path_t ) );
00449       trailCost = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( MAPLENGTH * sizeof( TRAILCELLTYPE ) );
00450       trailCostUsed = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( MAPLENGTH );
00451       trailTree = (trail_t *) MemAlloc( ABSMAX_TRAIL_TREE * sizeof( trail_t ) );
00452       if (!pathQ || !trailCost || !trailCostUsed || !trailTree)
00453       {
00454             return( FALSE );
00455       }
00456       pQueueHead = &(pathQ[QHEADNDX]);
00457       pClosedHead = &(pathQ[QPOOLNDX]);
00458       memset( trailCostUsed, 0, MAPLENGTH );
00459       return( TRUE );
00460 }
00461 
00462 void ShutDownPathAI( void )
00463 {
00464       MemFree( pathQ );
00465       MemFree( trailCostUsed );
00466       MemFree( trailCost );
00467       MemFree( trailTree );
00468 }
00469 
00470 void ReconfigurePathAI( INT32 iNewMaxSkipListLevel, INT32 iNewMaxTrailTree, INT32 iNewMaxPathQ )
00471 {
00472       // make sure the specified parameters are reasonable
00473       iNewMaxSkipListLevel = __max( iNewMaxSkipListLevel, ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL );
00474       iNewMaxTrailTree = __max( iNewMaxTrailTree, ABSMAX_TRAIL_TREE );
00475       iNewMaxPathQ = __max( iNewMaxPathQ, ABSMAX_PATHQ );
00476       // assign them
00477       iMaxSkipListLevel = iNewMaxSkipListLevel;
00478       iMaxTrailTree = iNewMaxTrailTree;
00479       iMaxPathQ = iNewMaxPathQ;
00480       // relocate the head of the closed list to the end of the array portion being used
00481       pClosedHead = &(pathQ[QPOOLNDX]);
00482       memset( pClosedHead, 0, sizeof( path_t ) );
00483 }
00484 
00485 void RestorePathAIToDefaults( void )
00486 {
00487       iMaxSkipListLevel = MAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL;
00488       iMaxTrailTree = MAX_TRAIL_TREE;
00489       iMaxPathQ = MAX_PATHQ;
00490       // relocate the head of the closed list to the end of the array portion being used
00491       pClosedHead = &(pathQ[QPOOLNDX]);
00492       memset( pClosedHead, 0, sizeof( path_t ) );
00493 }

00498 INT32 FindBestPath(SOLDIERTYPE *s , INT16 sDestination, INT8 ubLevel, INT16 usMovementMode, INT8 bCopy, UINT8 fFlags )
00499 {
00500       //__try
00501       //{
00502       INT32 iDestination = sDestination, iOrigination;
00503       INT32 iCnt=-1, iStructIndex;
00504       INT32 iLoopStart = 0, iLoopEnd = 0;

00511       //INT32 curY;

00515       INT32 iWaterToWater;

00518       #ifdef VEHICLE
00519             //BOOLEAN fTurnSlow = FALSE;
00520             //BOOLEAN fReverse = FALSE; // stuff for vehicles turning
00521             BOOLEAN fMultiTile, fVehicle;
00522             //INT32 iLastDir, iPrevToLastDir;
00523             //INT8 bVehicleCheckDir;
00524             //UINT16 adjLoc;

00526             UINT16                                           usAnimSurface;
00527             //INT32 iCnt2, iCnt3;
00528       #endif
00529 
00530       INT32             iLastDir = 0;
00531 
00532       path_t *    pNewPtr;
00533       path_t *    pCurrPtr;
00534 
00535       path_t *    pUpdate[ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL];
00536       path_t *    pCurr;
00537       path_t *    pNext;
00538       path_t *    pDel;
00539       UINT32            uiCost;

00541

00565   UINT16    usMovementModeToUseForAPs;

00569       CHAR8                   zTempString[1000], zTS[50];
00570 #endif
00571

00573       UINT16            usCounter = 0;
00574 #endif
00575 
00576       fVehicle = FALSE;
00577       iOriginationX = iOriginationY = 0;
00578       iOrigination = (INT32) s->sGridNo;
00579 
00580       if (iOrigination < 0 || iOrigination > WORLD_MAX)
00581       {
00582             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00583                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR!  Trying to calculate path from off-world gridno %d to %d", iOrigination, sDestination );
00584             #endif
00585             return( 0 );
00586       }
00587       else if (!GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16) iOrigination ) )
00588       {
00589             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00590                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR!  Trying to calculate path from non-visible gridno %d to %d", iOrigination, sDestination );
00591             #endif
00592             return( 0 );
00593       }
00594       else if (s->bLevel != ubLevel)
00595       {
00596             // pathing to a different level... bzzzt!
00597             return( 0 );
00598       }
00599 
00600       if ( gubGlobalPathFlags )
00601       {
00602             fFlags |= gubGlobalPathFlags; 
00603       }
00604 
00605       fTurnBased = ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) );
00606 
00607       fPathingForPlayer = ( (s->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && (!gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode) && !(s->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PCUNDERAICONTROL) );
00608       fNonFenceJumper = !( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( s ) );
00609       fNonSwimmer = !( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( s ) );
00610       if ( fNonSwimmer )
00611       {
00612             if ( Water( sDestination ) )
00613             {
00614                   return( 0 );
00615             }
00616       }
00617       fPathAroundPeople = ( (fFlags & PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE) == 0 );
00618       fCloseGoodEnough = ( (fFlags & PATH_CLOSE_GOOD_ENOUGH) != 0);
00619       if ( fCloseGoodEnough )
00620       {
00621             sClosePathLimit = __min( PythSpacesAway( (INT16)s->sGridNo, sDestination ) - 1,  PATH_CLOSE_RADIUS );
00622             if ( sClosePathLimit <= 0 )
00623             {
00624                   return( 0 );
00625             }
00626       }
00627 
00628       fConsiderPersonAtDestAsObstacle = (BOOLEAN)( fPathingForPlayer && fPathAroundPeople && !(fFlags & PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST) );
00629 
00630       if (bCopy >= COPYREACHABLE)
00631       {
00632             fCopyReachable = TRUE;
00633             fCopyPathCosts = (bCopy == COPYREACHABLE_AND_APS);
00634             fVisitSpotsOnlyOnce = (bCopy == COPYREACHABLE);
00635             // make sure we aren't trying to copy path costs for an area greater than the AI array...
00636             if (fCopyPathCosts && gubNPCDistLimit > AI_PATHCOST_RADIUS)
00637             {
00638                   // oy!!!! dis no supposed to happen!
00639                   gubNPCDistLimit = AI_PATHCOST_RADIUS;
00640             }
00641       }
00642       else
00643       {
00644             fCopyReachable = FALSE;
00645             fCopyPathCosts = FALSE;
00646             fVisitSpotsOnlyOnce = FALSE;
00647       }
00648 
00649       gubNPCPathCount++;
00650 
00651       if (gubGlobalPathCount == 255)
00652       {
00653             // reset arrays!
00654             memset( trailCostUsed, 0, MAPLENGTH );
00655             gubGlobalPathCount = 1;
00656       }
00657       else
00658       {
00659             gubGlobalPathCount++;
00660       }
00661 
00662       // only allow nowhere destination if distance limit set
00663       if (sDestination == NOWHERE)
00664       {
00665             /*
00666             if (gubNPCDistLimit == 0)
00667             {
00668                   return( FALSE );
00669             }     
00670             */     
00671       }
00672       else
00673       {
00674             // the very first thing to do is make sure the destination tile is reachable
00675             if (!NewOKDestination( s, sDestination, fConsiderPersonAtDestAsObstacle, ubLevel ))
00676             {
00677                   gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00678                   gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
00679                   return( FALSE );
00680             }
00681 
00682             if (sDestination == s->sGridNo)
00683             {
00684                   return( FALSE );
00685             }
00686       }
00687 
00688       if (gubNPCAPBudget)
00689       {
00690             ubAPCost = MinAPsToStartMovement( s, usMovementMode );
00691             if (ubAPCost > gubNPCAPBudget)
00692             {
00693                   gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00694                   gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
00695                   return( 0 );
00696             }
00697             else
00698             {
00699                   gubNPCAPBudget -= ubAPCost;
00700             }
00701       }
00702       
00703 #ifdef COUNT_PATHS
00704       guiTotalPathChecks++;
00705 #endif
00706 
00707 #ifdef VEHICLE    
00708 
00709       fMultiTile = ((s->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE) != 0);
00710       if (fMultiTile)
00711       {
00712             // Get animation surface...
00713             // Chris_C... change this to use parameter.....
00714             usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( s, usMovementMode );
00715             // Get structure ref...
00716             pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( s->ubID, usAnimSurface, usMovementMode );
00717             
00718             if ( pStructureFileRef )
00719             {
00720                   fVehicle = ( (s->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) != 0 );
00721 
00722                   fContinuousTurnNeeded = ( ( s->uiStatusFlags & (SOLDIER_MONSTER | SOLDIER_ANIMAL | SOLDIER_VEHICLE) ) != 0 );
00723 
00724                   /*
00725                   if (fVehicle && s->bReverse)
00726                   {
00727                         fReverse = TRUE;
00728                   }
00729                   */
00730                   /*
00731                   if (fVehicle || s->ubBodyType == COW || s->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT) // or a vehicle
00732                   {
00733                         fTurnSlow = TRUE;
00734                   }
00735                   */
00736                   if ( gfEstimatePath )
00737                   {
00738                         usOKToAddStructID = IGNORE_PEOPLE_STRUCTURE_ID;
00739                   }
00740                   else if ( s->pLevelNode != NULL && s->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
00741                   {
00742                         usOKToAddStructID = s->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
00743                   }
00744                   else
00745                   {
00746                         usOKToAddStructID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
00747                   }
00748 
00749             }
00750             else
00751             {
00752                   // turn off multitile pathing
00753                   fMultiTile = FALSE;
00754                   fContinuousTurnNeeded = FALSE;
00755             }
00756 
00757       }
00758       else
00759       {
00760             fContinuousTurnNeeded = FALSE;
00761       }
00762 
00763 #endif
00764 
00765       if (!fContinuousTurnNeeded)
00766       {
00767             iLoopStart = 0;
00768             iLoopEnd = 0;
00769             bLoopState = LOOPING_CLOCKWISE;
00770       }
00771 
00772       ubCurAPCost = 0;
00773       queRequests = 2;
00774 
00775       //initialize the path data structures
00776       memset( pathQ, 0, iMaxPathQ * sizeof( path_t ) );
00777       memset( trailTree, 0, iMaxTrailTree * sizeof( trail_t ) );
00778 
00779 #if defined( PATHAI_VISIBLE_DEBUG )
00780       if (gfDisplayCoverValues && gfDrawPathPoints)
00781       {
00782             memset( gsCoverValue, 0x7F, sizeof( INT16 ) * WORLD_MAX );
00783       }
00784 #endif
00785 
00786       bSkipListLevel = 1;
00787       iSkipListSize = 0;
00788       iClosedListSize = 0;
00789 
00790       trailTreeNdx=0;
00791 
00792       //set up common info
00793       if (fCopyPathCosts)
00794       {
00795             iOriginationY = (iOrigination / MAPWIDTH);
00796             iOriginationX = (iOrigination % MAPWIDTH);
00797       }
00798       
00799       iDestY = (iDestination / MAPWIDTH);
00800       iDestX = (iDestination % MAPWIDTH);
00801       
00802       // if origin and dest is water, then user wants to stay in water!
00803       // so, check and set waterToWater flag accordingly
00804       if (iDestination == NOWHERE)
00805       {
00806             iWaterToWater = 0;
00807       }
00808       else
00809       {
00810             if (ISWATER(gubWorldMovementCosts[iOrigination][0][ubLevel]) && ISWATER(gubWorldMovementCosts[iDestination][0][ubLevel]))
00811                         iWaterToWater = 1;
00812             else
00813                         iWaterToWater = 0;
00814       }
00815 
00816       //setup Q and first path record
00817 
00818       SETLOC( *pQueueHead, iOrigination );
00819       pQueueHead->usCostSoFar = MAXCOST;
00820       pQueueHead->bLevel                  = iMaxSkipListLevel - 1;
00821 
00822       pClosedHead->pNext[0] = pClosedHead;
00823       pClosedHead->pNext[1] = pClosedHead;
00824 
00825       //setup first path record
00826       iLocY = iOrigination / MAPWIDTH;
00827       iLocX = iOrigination % MAPWIDTH;
00828 
00829       SETLOC( pathQ[1], iOrigination );
00830       pathQ[1].sPathNdx                               = 0;
00831       pathQ[1].usCostSoFar                      = 0;
00832       if ( fCopyReachable )
00833       {
00834             pathQ[1].usCostToGo                             = 100;
00835       }
00836       else
00837       {
00838             pathQ[1].usCostToGo                             = REMAININGCOST( &(pathQ[1]) );
00839       }
00840       pathQ[1].usTotalCost                      = pathQ[1].usCostSoFar + pathQ[1].usCostToGo;
00841       pathQ[1].ubLegDistance              = LEGDISTANCE( iLocX, iLocY, iDestX, iDestY );
00842       pathQ[1].bLevel                                       = 1;
00843       pQueueHead->pNext[0] = &( pathQ[1] );
00844       iSkipListSize++;
00845 
00846       trailTreeNdx                                    =     0;
00847       trailCost[iOrigination] =     0;
00848       pCurrPtr                                                                = pQueueHead->pNext[0];
00849       pCurrPtr->sPathNdx                                    = trailTreeNdx;
00850       trailTreeNdx++;
00851 
00852 
00853       do
00854       {
00855             //remove the first and best path so far from the que
00856             pCurrPtr                      = pQueueHead->pNext[0];
00857             curLoc            = pCurrPtr->iLocation;
00858             curCost           = pCurrPtr->usCostSoFar;
00859             sCurPathNdx = pCurrPtr->sPathNdx;
00860 
00861             // remember the cost used to get here...
00862             prevCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ trailTree[ sCurPathNdx ].sGridNo ][ trailTree[ sCurPathNdx ].stepDir ][ ubLevel ]; 
00863 
00864 #if defined( PATHAI_VISIBLE_DEBUG )
00865             if (gfDisplayCoverValues && gfDrawPathPoints)
00866             {
00867                   if (gsCoverValue[ curLoc ] > 0)
00868                   {
00869                         gsCoverValue[ curLoc ] *= -1;
00870                   }
00871             }
00872 #endif
00873 
00874 #ifdef VEHICLE
00875             /*
00876             if (fTurnSlow)
00877             {
00878                   if (pCurrPtr->pNext[0] == 0)
00879                   {
00880                         if (fReverse)
00881                         {
00882                               iLastDir = gOppositeDirection[s->bDirection];
00883                         }
00884                         else
00885                         {
00886                               iLastDir = s->bDirection;
00887                         }
00888                         // start prev-to-last dir at same as current (could cause a problem)
00889                         iPrevToLastDir = iLastDir;
00890                   }
00891                   else 
00892                   {
00893                         iPrevToLastDir = trailTree[trailTree[pCurrPtr->sPathNdx].nextLink].dirDelta;
00894                         iLastDir = trailTree[pCurrPtr->sPathNdx].dirDelta;
00895                   }
00896 
00897             }
00898             */
00899 #endif
00900 
00901             if (gubNPCAPBudget)
00902             {
00903                   ubCurAPCost = pCurrPtr->ubTotalAPCost;
00904             }
00905             if (fCopyReachable && prevCost != TRAVELCOST_FENCE)
00906             {
00907                   gpWorldLevelData[curLoc].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE;
00908                   if (gubBuildingInfoToSet > 0)
00909                   {
00910                         gubBuildingInfo[ curLoc ] = gubBuildingInfoToSet;
00911                   }
00912             }
00913 
00914             DELQUENODE( pCurrPtr );
00915                         
00916             if ( trailCostUsed[curLoc] == gubGlobalPathCount && trailCost[curLoc] < curCost)
00917                   goto NEXTDIR;
00918 
00919             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "PATHAI %d", curLoc ) );
00920 
00921             if (fContinuousTurnNeeded)
00922             {
00923                   if (trailTreeNdx < 2)
00924                   {
00925                         iLastDir = s->bDirection;
00926                   }
00927                   else if ( trailTree[pCurrPtr->sPathNdx].fFlags & STEP_BACKWARDS )
00928                   {
00929                         iLastDir = gOppositeDirection[ trailTree[pCurrPtr->sPathNdx].stepDir ];
00930                   }
00931                   else
00932                   {
00933                         iLastDir = trailTree[pCurrPtr->sPathNdx].stepDir;
00934                   }
00935                   iLoopStart = iLastDir;
00936                   iLoopEnd = iLastDir;
00937                   bLoopState = LOOPING_CLOCKWISE;
00938                   fCheckedBehind = FALSE;
00939             }
00940 
00941             //contemplate a new path in each direction
00942             //for ( iCnt = iLoopStart; iCnt != iLoopEnd; iCnt = (iCnt + iLoopIncrement) % MAXDIR )
00943             for ( iCnt = iLoopStart; ; )
00944             {
00945 
00946 #ifdef VEHICLE
00947                   /*
00948                   if (fTurnSlow)
00949                   {
00950                         if (iLastDir == iPrevToLastDir)
00951                         {
00952                               if ( iCnt != iLastDir && iCnt != gOneCDirection[ iLastDir ] && iCnt != gOneCCDirection[ iLastDir ])
00953                               {
00954                                     goto NEXTDIR;
00955                               }
00956                         }
00957                         else
00958                         {
00959                               if ( iCnt != iLastDir )
00960                               {
00961                                     goto NEXTDIR;
00962                               }
00963                         }
00964                   }
00965                   */
00966 
00967                   if ( bLoopState == LOOPING_REVERSE )
00968                   {
00969                         iStructIndex = gOppositeDirection[ gOneCDirection[ iCnt ] ];
00970                   }
00971                   else
00972                   {
00973                         iStructIndex = gOneCDirection[ iCnt ];
00974                   }
00975 
00976                   if (fMultiTile)
00977                   {
00978                         if ( fContinuousTurnNeeded )                    
00979                         {
00980                               if ( iCnt != iLastDir )
00981                               {
00982                                     if ( !OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16) curLoc, ubLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ iStructIndex ]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
00983                                     {
00984                                           // we have to abort this loop and possibly reset the loop conditions to
00985                                           // search in the other direction (if we haven't already done the other dir)
00986                                           if (bLoopState == LOOPING_CLOCKWISE)
00987                                           {
00988                                                 iLoopStart = iLastDir;
00989                                                 iLoopEnd = iCnt;
00990                                                 bLoopState = LOOPING_COUNTERCLOCKWISE; // backwards
00991                                                 // when we go to the bottom of the loop, iLoopIncrement will be added to iCnt
00992                                                 // which is good since it avoids duplication of effort
00993                                                 iCnt = iLoopStart;
00994                                                 goto NEXTDIR;
00995                                           }
00996                                           else if ( bLoopState == LOOPING_COUNTERCLOCKWISE && !fCheckedBehind )
00997                                           {
00998                                                 // check rear dir
00999                                                 bLoopState = LOOPING_REVERSE;
01000 
01001                                                 // NB we're stuck with adding 1 to the loop counter down below so configure to accomodate...
01002                                                 //iLoopStart = (iLastDir + (MAXDIR / 2) - 1) % MAXDIR;
01003                                                 iLoopStart = gOppositeDirection[ gOneCCDirection[ iLastDir ] ];
01004                                                 iLoopEnd = (iLoopStart + 2) % MAXDIR;
01005                                                 iCnt = iLoopStart;
01006                                                 fCheckedBehind = TRUE;
01007                                                 goto NEXTDIR;
01008                                           }
01009                                           else
01010                                           {
01011                                                 // done
01012                                                 goto ENDOFLOOP;
01013                                           }
01014 
01015                                     }
01016                               }
01017                         }
01018                         else if ( pStructureFileRef )
01019                         {
01020                               // check to make sure it's okay for us to turn to the new direction in our current tile 
01021                               if (!OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16) curLoc, ubLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ iStructIndex ]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
01022                               {
01023                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01024                               }
01025                         }
01026                   }
01027 
01028 #endif
01029 
01030                   newLoc = curLoc + dirDelta[iCnt];
01031 
01032 
01033                   if ( fVisitSpotsOnlyOnce && trailCostUsed[newLoc] == gubGlobalPathCount )
01034                   {
01035                         // on a "reachable" test, never revisit locations!
01036                         goto NEXTDIR;
01037                   }
01038 
01039                   
01040                   //if (gpWorldLevelData[newLoc].sHeight != ubLevel)
01041                   //ATE: Movement onto cliffs? Check vs the soldier's gridno height
01042                   // CJC: PREVIOUS LOCATION's height
01043                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].sHeight != gpWorldLevelData[ curLoc ].sHeight )
01044                   {
01045                         goto NEXTDIR;
01046                   }
01047 
01048                   if (gubNPCDistLimit)
01049                   {
01050                         if ( gfNPCCircularDistLimit )
01051                         {
01052                               if (PythSpacesAway( (INT16) iOrigination, (INT16) newLoc) > gubNPCDistLimit)
01053                               {
01054                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01055                               }
01056                         }
01057                         else
01058                         {
01059                               if (SpacesAway( (INT16) iOrigination, (INT16) newLoc) > gubNPCDistLimit)
01060                               {
01061                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01062                               }                       
01063                         }
01064                   }
01065 
01066                   // AI check for mines
01067                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[newLoc].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT && s->bSide != 0)
01068                   {
01069                         goto NEXTDIR;
01070                   }
01071 
01072                   /*
01073                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[newLoc].uiFlags & (MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT | MAPELEMENT_PLAYER_MINE_PRESENT) )
01074                   {
01075                         if (s->bSide == 0)
01076                         {
01077                               // For our team, skip a location with a known mines unless it is the end of our
01078                               // path; for others on our side, skip such locations completely;
01079                               if (s->bTeam != gbPlayerNum || newLoc != iDestination)
01080                               {
01081                                     if (gpWorldLevelData[newLoc].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_PLAYER_MINE_PRESENT)
01082                                     {
01083                                           goto NEXTDIR;
01084                                     }
01085                               }
01086                         }
01087                         else
01088                         {
01089                               // For the enemy, always skip known mines
01090                               if (gpWorldLevelData[newLoc].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT)
01091                               {
01092                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01093                               }
01094                         }
01095                   }
01096                   */
01097 
01098                   //how much is admission to the next tile
01099                   if ( gfPathAroundObstacles )
01100                   {
01101                         nextCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ newLoc ][ iCnt ][ ubLevel ];
01102 
01103                         //ATE:      Check for differences from reality 
01104                         // Is next cost an obstcale
01105                         if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_HIDDENOBSTACLE )
01106                         {
01107                               if ( fPathingForPlayer )
01108                               {
01109                                     // Is this obstcale a hidden tile that has not been revealed yet?
01110                                     if( DoesGridnoContainHiddenStruct( (UINT16)newLoc, &fHiddenStructVisible ) )
01111                                     {
01112                                           // Are we not visible, if so use terrain costs!
01113                                           if ( !fHiddenStructVisible )
01114                                           {
01115                                                 // Set cost of terrain!
01116                                                 nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01117                                           }
01118                                     }
01119                               }
01120                         }
01121                         else if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING )
01122                         {
01123                               // for path plotting purposes, use the terrain value
01124                               nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01125                         }
01126                         else if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_EXITGRID )
01127                         {
01128                               if (gfPlotPathToExitGrid)
01129                               {
01130                                     // replace with terrain cost so that we can plot path, otherwise is obstacle
01131                                     nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01132                               }
01133                         }
01134                         else if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_FENCE && fNonFenceJumper )
01135                         {
01136                               goto NEXTDIR;
01137                         }
01138                         else if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( nextCost ) )
01139                         {
01140 
01141                               // don't let anyone path diagonally through doors!
01142                               if (iCnt & 1)
01143                               {
01144                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01145                               }
01146 
01147                               switch( nextCost )
01148                               {
01149                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE:
01150                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
01151                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc;
01152                                           break;
01153                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N:
01154                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
01155                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
01156                                           break;
01157                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W:
01158                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
01159                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ WEST ];
01160                                           break;
01161                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE:
01162                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01163                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc;
01164                                           break;
01165                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N:
01166                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01167                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
01168                                           break;
01169                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NE:
01170                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01171                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTHEAST ];
01172                                           break;
01173                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_E:
01174                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01175                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ EAST ];
01176                                           break;
01177                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SE:
01178                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01179                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ SOUTHEAST ];
01180                                           break;
01181                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_S:
01182                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01183                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ SOUTH ];
01184                                           break;
01185                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SW:
01186                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01187                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ SOUTHWEST ];
01188                                           break;
01189                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W:
01190                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01191                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ WEST ];
01192                                           break;
01193                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW:
01194                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01195                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ];
01196                                           break;
01197                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N_N:
01198                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01199                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTH ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
01200                                           break;
01201                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_N:
01202                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01203                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
01204                                           break;
01205                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NE_N:
01206                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01207                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTHEAST ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
01208                                           break;
01209                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W_W:
01210                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01211                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ WEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
01212                                           break;
01213                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SW_W:
01214                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01215                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ SOUTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
01216                                           break;
01217                                     case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_W:
01218                                           fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
01219                                           iDoorGridNo = newLoc + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
01220                                           break;
01221                                     default:
01222                                           break;
01223                               }
01224 
01225                               if ( fPathingForPlayer && gpWorldLevelData[ iDoorGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_DOOR_STATUS_PRESENT )
01226                               {
01227                                     // check door status
01228                                     pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( (INT16) iDoorGridNo );
01229                                     if (pDoorStatus)
01230                                     {
01231                                           fDoorIsOpen = (pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_OPEN) != 0;
01232                                     }
01233                                     else
01234                                     {
01235                                           // door destroyed?
01236                                           nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01237                                     }
01238                               }
01239                               else
01240                               {
01241                                     // check door structure
01242                                     pDoorStructure = FindStructure( (INT16) iDoorGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
01243                                     if (pDoorStructure)
01244                                     {
01245                                           fDoorIsOpen = (pDoorStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) != 0;
01246                                     }
01247                                     else
01248                                     {
01249                                           // door destroyed?
01250                                           nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01251                                     }
01252                               }
01253 
01254                               // now determine movement cost... if it hasn't been changed already
01255                               if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( nextCost ) )
01256                               {
01257 
01258                                     if (fDoorIsOpen)
01259                                     {
01260                                           if (fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed)
01261                                           {
01262                                                 nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01263                                           }
01264                                           else
01265                                           {
01266                                                 nextCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
01267                                           }
01268                                     }
01269                                     else
01270                                     {
01271                                           if (fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed)
01272                                           {                       
01273                                                 // door is closed and this should be an obstacle, EXCEPT if we are calculating
01274                                                 // a path for an enemy or NPC with keys
01275                                                 if ( fPathingForPlayer || ( s && (s->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER || s->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ANIMAL) ) )
01276                                                 {
01277                                                       nextCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
01278                                                 }
01279                                                 else
01280                                                 {
01281                                                       // have to check if door is locked and NPC does not have keys!
01282                                                       pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( iDoorGridNo );
01283                                                       if (pDoor)
01284                                                       {
01285                                                             if (!pDoor->fLocked || s->bHasKeys)
01286                                                             {
01287                                                                   // add to AP cost
01288                                                                   if (gubNPCAPBudget)
01289                                                                   {
01290                                                                         fGoingThroughDoor = TRUE;
01291                                                                   }
01292                                                                   nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01293                                                             }
01294                                                             else
01295                                                             {
01296                                                                   nextCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
01297                                                             }
01298                                                       }
01299                                                       else
01300                                                       {
01301                                                             nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01302                                                       }
01303                                                 }
01304                                           }
01305                                           else
01306                                           {
01307                                                 nextCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ newLoc ].ubTerrainID ];
01308                                           }
01309                                     }
01310                               }
01311                         }
01312                         else if ( (nextCost == TRAVELCOST_SHORE || nextCost == TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP || nextCost == TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER ) && fNonSwimmer )
01313                         {
01314                               // creatures and animals can't go in water
01315                               nextCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
01316                         }
01317                   
01318 
01319                         // Apr. '96 - moved up be ahead of AP_Budget stuff
01320                         if ( ( nextCost >= NOPASS) ) // || ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_DOOR ) )
01321                                     goto NEXTDIR;
01322 
01323                   }
01324                   else
01325                   {
01326                         nextCost = TRAVELCOST_FLAT;   
01327                   }
01328 
01329                   if ( newLoc > GRIDSIZE )
01330                   {
01331                         // WHAT THE??? hack.
01332                         goto NEXTDIR;
01333                   }
01334                   
01335                   // if contemplated tile is NOT final dest and someone there, disqualify route
01336                   // when doing a reachable test, ignore all locations with people in them
01337                   if (fPathAroundPeople && ( (newLoc != iDestination) || fCopyReachable) )
01338                   {
01339                          // ATE: ONLY cancel if they are moving.....
01340                         ubMerc = WhoIsThere2( (UINT16) newLoc, s->bLevel);
01341 
01342                         if ( ubMerc < NOBODY && ubMerc != s->ubID )
01343                         {     
01344                               // Check for movement....
01345                               //if ( fTurnBased || ( (Menptr[ ubMerc ].sFinalDestination == Menptr[ ubMerc ].sGridNo) || (Menptr[ ubMerc ].fDelayedMovement) ) )
01346                               //{
01347                                     goto NEXTDIR;     
01348                               //}
01349                         //    else
01350                               //{
01351                               //    nextCost += 50;
01352                               //}
01353                         }
01354                   }
01355 
01356 #ifdef VEHICLE
01357                   if (fMultiTile)
01358                   {
01359                         // vehicle test for obstacles: prevent movement to next tile if
01360                         // a tile covered by the vehicle in that position & direction
01361                         // has an obstacle in it
01362 
01363                         // because of the order in which animations are stored (dir 7 first,
01364                         // then 0 1 2 3 4 5 6), we must subtract 1 from the direction
01365                         // ATE: Send in our existing structure ID so it's ignored!
01366 
01367                         if (!OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16) newLoc, ubLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ iStructIndex ]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
01368                         {
01369                               goto NEXTDIR;
01370                         }
01371 
01372                         /*
01373                         // vehicles aren't moving any more.... 
01374                         if (fVehicle)
01375                         {
01376                               // transmogrify pathing costs for vehicles!
01377                               switch(nextCost)
01378                               {
01379                                     case TRAVELCOST_THICK         :     nextCost = TRAVELCOST_GRASS;
01380                                                                                                                   break;
01381                                     case TRAVELCOST_SHORE         : 
01382                                     case TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP:        
01383                                     case TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER:
01384 //                                  case TRAVELCOST_VEINEND :
01385 //                                  case TRAVELCOST_VEINMID :
01386                                     //case TRAVELCOST_DOOR        :
01387                                     case TRAVELCOST_FENCE         :     nextCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
01388                                                                                                                   break;
01389 
01390                                     default                                                     :     break;
01391                               }
01392                         }
01393                         */
01394                   }
01395 #endif
01396 
01397                   // NEW Apr 21 by Ian: abort if cost exceeds budget
01398                   if (gubNPCAPBudget)
01399                    {
01400                         switch(nextCost)
01401                         {
01402                               case TRAVELCOST_NONE          : ubAPCost = 0;
01403                                                                                                             break;
01404 
01405                               case TRAVELCOST_DIRTROAD:
01406                               case TRAVELCOST_FLAT          : ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT; 
01407                                                                                                             break;
01408                               //case TRAVELCOST_BUMPY :           
01409                               case TRAVELCOST_GRASS         : ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_GRASS;
01410                                                                                                             break;
01411                               case TRAVELCOST_THICK         :     ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_BUSH;
01412                                                                                                             break;
01413                               case TRAVELCOST_DEBRIS  : ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_RUBBLE;
01414                                                                                                             break;
01415                               case TRAVELCOST_SHORE         : ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_SHORE; // wading shallow water
01416                                                                                                             break;
01417                               case TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP:     ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_LAKE; // wading waist/chest deep - very slow
01418                                                                                                             break;
01419 
01420                               case TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER:ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_OCEAN; // can swim, so it's faster than wading
01421                                                                                                             break;
01422                               //case TRAVELCOST_VEINEND     :
01423                               //case TRAVELCOST_VEINMID     : ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;
01424                               //                                                                            break;
01425 
01426                               //case TRAVELCOST_DOOR        :     ubAPCost = AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT;
01427                               //                                                                            break;
01428 
01429                               case TRAVELCOST_FENCE         : ubAPCost = AP_JUMPFENCE;
01430                   
01431 /*
01432                   if ( sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
01433                   {
01434                         sPoints += sTileCost;
01435 
01436                         // If we are changeing stance ( either before or after getting there....
01437                         // We need to reflect that...
01438                         switch(usMovementMode)
01439                         {
01440                               case RUNNING:     
01441                               case WALKING :
01442

01444                                     // Since it's AFTER.. make sure we will be moving after jump...
01445                                     if ( ( iCnt + 2 ) < iLastGrid )
01446                                     {
01447                                           sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
01448                                     }
01449                                     break;
01450 
01451                               case SWATTING:    
01452 
01453                                     // Add cost to stand once there BEFORE....
01454                                     sPoints += AP_CROUCH;
01455                                     break;
01456 
01457                               case CRAWLING:    
01458 
01459                                     // Can't do it here.....
01460                                     break;
01461 
01462                         }
