01464 
01465 */                            
01466                               
01467                                                                                                             break;                              
01468 
01469                               case TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE: 
01470                               default                                                     :     goto NEXTDIR;     // Cost too much to be considered!
01471                                                                                                             break;
01472                         }
01473 
01474                     
01475                     // don't make the mistake of adding directly to
01476                     // ubCurAPCost, that must be preserved for remaining dirs!
01477                         if (iCnt & 1)
01478                         {
01479                               //ubAPCost++;
01480                               //ubAPCost = gubDiagCost[ubAPCost];
01481                               ubAPCost = (ubAPCost * 14) / 10;
01482                         }
01483                         
01484         usMovementModeToUseForAPs = usMovementMode;
01485 
01486         // ATE: if water, force to be walking always!
01487         if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_SHORE || nextCost == TRAVELCOST_KNEEDEEP || nextCost == TRAVELCOST_DEEPWATER )
01488         {
01489           usMovementModeToUseForAPs = WALKING;
01490         }
01491 
01492                         // adjust AP cost for movement mode
01493                         switch( usMovementModeToUseForAPs )
01494                         {
01495                               case RUNNING:     
01496                               case ADULTMONSTER_WALKING:    
01497                                     // save on casting
01498                                     ubAPCost = ubAPCost * 10 / ( (UINT8) (RUNDIVISOR * 10));
01499                                     //ubAPCost = (INT16)(DOUBLE)( (sTileCost / RUNDIVISOR) );   break;
01500                                     break;
01501                               case WALKING:
01502                               case ROBOT_WALK:
01503                                     ubAPCost = (ubAPCost + WALKCOST);
01504                                     break;
01505                               case SWATTING:
01506                                     ubAPCost = (ubAPCost + SWATCOST);
01507                                     break;
01508                               case CRAWLING:
01509                                     ubAPCost = (ubAPCost + CRAWLCOST);
01510                                     break;
01511                         }
01512 
01513                         if (nextCost == TRAVELCOST_FENCE)
01514                         {
01515                               switch( usMovementModeToUseForAPs )
01516                               {
01517                                     case RUNNING:     
01518                                     case WALKING :
01519                                           // Here pessimistically assume the path will continue after hopping the fence
01520                                           ubAPCost += AP_CROUCH;
01521                                           break;
01522 
01523                                     case SWATTING:    
01524 
01525                                           // Add cost to stand once there BEFORE jumping....
01526                                           ubAPCost += AP_CROUCH;
01527                                           break;
01528 
01529                                     case CRAWLING:    
01530 
01531                                           // Can't do it here.....
01532                                           goto NEXTDIR;
01533                               }
01534                         }
01535                         else if (nextCost == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING)
01536                         {
01537                               switch(usMovementModeToUseForAPs)
01538                               {
01539                                     case RUNNING:     
01540                                     case WALKING :
01541                                           // charge crouch APs for ducking head!
01542                                           ubAPCost += AP_CROUCH;
01543                                           break;
01544 
01545                                     default:                      
01546                                           break;
01547                               }
01548                         }
01549                         else if (fGoingThroughDoor)
01550                         {
01551                               ubAPCost += AP_OPEN_DOOR;
01552                               fGoingThroughDoor = FALSE;
01553                         }
01554 
01555 
01556                     ubNewAPCost = ubCurAPCost + ubAPCost;
01557 
01558 
01559                     if (ubNewAPCost > gubNPCAPBudget)
01560                       goto NEXTDIR;
01561 
01562                    }
01563                   
01564                   //ATE: Uncommented out for doors, if we are at a door but not dest, continue!
01565             //    if ( nextCost == TRAVELCOST_DOOR  ) //&& newLoc != iDestination)
01566             //          goto NEXTDIR;
01567 /*
01568                   // FOLLOWING SECTION COMMENTED OUT ON MARCH 7/97 BY IC
01569 
01570                   if (nextCost == SECRETCOST && !s->human)
01571                        goto NEXTDIR;
01572 
01573                   if (prevCost==VEINMIDCOST)
01574                         if (!ISVEIN(nextCost))
01575                               goto NEXTDIR;
01576                   //veining check
01577                   if (nextCost==VEINMIDCOST)
01578                         if (!ISVEIN(prevCost))
01579                               goto NEXTDIR;
01580 
01581                   if (nextCost==VEINMIDCOST)
01582                     //if (ISVEIN(nextCost))
01583                         nextCost=VEINCOST;
01584                   else
01585                      if (nextCost==VEINENDCOST)
01586                        if (Grid[newLoc].land < LAKE1)
01587                           nextCost = VEINCOST;
01588                        else
01589                           nextCost = OCEANCOST+(10*PATHFACTOR);
01590 
01591       */
01592 
01593                   if ( fCloseGoodEnough )
01594                   {
01595                         if ( PythSpacesAway( (INT16)newLoc, sDestination ) <= sClosePathLimit )
01596                         {
01597                               // stop the path here!
01598                               iDestination = newLoc;
01599                               sDestination = (INT16) newLoc;
01600                               fCloseGoodEnough = FALSE;
01601                         }
01602                   }
01603                   //make the destination look very attractive
01604                   if (newLoc == iDestination)
01605                               nextCost = 0;
01606                   else
01607                          //if (_KeyDown(CTRL_DOWN) && nextCost < TRAVELCOST_VEINEND)
01608                          if (gfPlotDirectPath && nextCost < NOPASS)
01609                                     nextCost = TRAVELCOST_FLAT;
01610                           
01611 
01612 
01613                   //if (ISVEIN(prevCost))
01614                   //          prevCost=VEINCOST;
01615 
01616 
01617                   // make water cost attractive for water to water paths
01618                   if (iWaterToWater)
01619                   {
01620                         if (ISWATER(prevCost))
01621                               prevCost = EASYWATERCOST;
01622                         if (ISWATER(nextCost))
01623                               nextCost = EASYWATERCOST;
01624                   }
01625 
01626 // NOTE: on September 24, 1997, Chris went back to a diagonal bias system
01627                   if (iCnt & 1)
01628                   {
01629                         // moving on a diagonal
01630                         //nextCost = gubDiagCost[nextCost];
01631                         nextCost = nextCost * 14 / 10;
01632                         //nextCost++;
01633                   }
01634 
01635                   if ( bLoopState == LOOPING_REVERSE)
01636                   {
01637                         // penalize moving backwards to encourage turning sooner
01638                         nextCost += 50;
01639                   }
01640 
01641                   newTotCost = curCost + nextCost;
01642 
01643 /*
01644 // no diagonal bias - straightforward costing regardless of direction
01645                   newTotCost = curCost + nextCost;
01646 
01647 
01648 // NOTE: ON JAN 6TH, 1995, IAN COMMENTED OUT THE DIAGONAL BIAS AND
01649 //       UNCOMMENTED THE "NO DIAGONAL BIAS"
01650 //diagonal bias - this makes diagonal moves cost more
01651 
01652 
01653           if (iCnt & 1)
01654                   // diagonal move costs 70 percent
01655                              //newTotCost += (nextCost/PATHFACTOR);
01656                        newTotCost += 1;
01657 //                      newTotCost = curCost + ((prevCost+nextCost)*7)/10;
01658 //                else  // non-diagonal costs only 50%
01659 //                      newTotCost = curCost + (prevCost+nextCost)/2;
01660 */
01661 
01662                   // have we found a path to the current location that
01663                   // costs less than the best so far to the same location?
01664                   if (trailCostUsed[newLoc] != gubGlobalPathCount || newTotCost < trailCost[newLoc])
01665                   {
01666 
01667                         #if defined( PATHAI_VISIBLE_DEBUG )
01668 
01669                               if (gfDisplayCoverValues && gfDrawPathPoints)
01670                               {
01671                                     if (gsCoverValue[newLoc] == 0x7F7F)
01672                                     {
01673                                           gsCoverValue[newLoc] = usCounter++;
01674                                     }
01675                                     /*
01676                                     else if (gsCoverValue[newLoc] >= 0)
01677                                     {
01678                                           gsCoverValue[newLoc]++;
01679                                     }
01680                                     else
01681                                     {
01682                                           gsCoverValue[newLoc]--;
01683                                     }
01684                                     */
01685                               }
01686                         #endif
01687 
01688                         //NEWQUENODE;                       
01689                         {
01690                               if (queRequests<QPOOLNDX)
01691                               {
01692                                     pNewPtr = pathQ + (queRequests);
01693                                     queRequests++;
01694                                     memset( pNewPtr->pNext, 0, sizeof( path_t *) * ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL );
01695                                     pNewPtr->bLevel = RandomSkipListLevel();
01696                               }
01697                               else if (iClosedListSize > 0)
01698                               {
01699                                     pNewPtr = pClosedHead->pNext[0];
01700                                     pClosedHead->pNext[0] = pNewPtr->pNext[0];
01701                                     iClosedListSize--;
01702                                     queRequests++;
01703                                     memset( pNewPtr->pNext, 0, sizeof( path_t *) * ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL );
01704                                     pNewPtr->bLevel = RandomSkipListLevel();
01705                               }
01706                               else
01707                               {
01708                                     pNewPtr = NULL;
01709                               }
01710                         }
01711 
01712                         if (pNewPtr == NULL)
01713                         {
01714                               #ifdef COUNT_PATHS
01715                                     guiFailedPathChecks++;
01716                               #endif
01717                               gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
01718                               gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
01719                               return(0);
01720                         }
01721 
01722                         //make new path to current location
01723                         trailTree[trailTreeNdx].nextLink    = sCurPathNdx;
01724                         trailTree[trailTreeNdx].stepDir     = (INT8) iCnt;
01725                         if ( bLoopState == LOOPING_REVERSE )
01726                         {
01727                               trailTree[trailTreeNdx].fFlags = STEP_BACKWARDS;
01728                         }
01729                         else
01730                         {
01731                               trailTree[trailTreeNdx].fFlags = 0;
01732                         }
01733                         trailTree[trailTreeNdx].sGridNo           = (INT16) newLoc;
01734                         pNewPtr->sPathNdx                               = trailTreeNdx;
01735                         trailTreeNdx++;
01736 
01737                         if (trailTreeNdx >= iMaxTrailTree)
01738                         {
01739                               #ifdef COUNT_PATHS
01740                                     guiFailedPathChecks++;
01741                               #endif
01742                               gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
01743                               gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
01744                               return(0);
01745                         }
01746 
01747                         iLocY = newLoc / MAPWIDTH;
01748                         iLocX = newLoc % MAPWIDTH;
01749                         SETLOC( *pNewPtr, newLoc );
01750                         pNewPtr->usCostSoFar          = (UINT16) newTotCost;
01751                         pNewPtr->usCostToGo                 = (UINT16) REMAININGCOST(pNewPtr);
01752                         if ( fCopyReachable )
01753                         {
01754                               pNewPtr->usCostToGo                 = 100;
01755                         }
01756                         else
01757                         {
01758                               pNewPtr->usCostToGo                 = (UINT16) REMAININGCOST(pNewPtr);
01759                         }
01760 
01761                         pNewPtr->usTotalCost          = newTotCost + pNewPtr->usCostToGo;
01762                         pNewPtr->ubLegDistance  = LEGDISTANCE( iLocX, iLocY, iDestX, iDestY );
01763                         
01764                         if (gubNPCAPBudget)
01765                         {
01766                           //save the AP cost so far along this path
01767                           pNewPtr->ubTotalAPCost = ubNewAPCost;
01768                               // update the AP costs in the AI array of path costs if necessary...
01769                               if (fCopyPathCosts)
01770                               {
01771                                     iX = AI_PATHCOST_RADIUS + iLocX - iOriginationX;
01772                                     iY = AI_PATHCOST_RADIUS + iLocY - iOriginationY;
01773                                     gubAIPathCosts[iX][iY] = ubNewAPCost;
01774                               }
01775                         }
01776 
01777                         //update the trail map to reflect the newer shorter path
01778                         trailCost[newLoc] = (UINT16) newTotCost;
01779                         trailCostUsed[newLoc] = gubGlobalPathCount;
01780                   
01781                         //do a sorted que insert of the new path
01782                         // COMMENTED OUT TO DO BOUNDS CHECKER CC JAN 18 99
01783                         //QUEINSERT(pNewPtr);
01784                         //#define SkipListInsert( pNewPtr )
01785                         {
01786                               pCurr = pQueueHead;
01787                               uiCost = TOTALCOST( pNewPtr );
01788                               memset( pUpdate, 0, MAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL * sizeof( path_t *) );
01789                               for (iCurrLevel = bSkipListLevel - 1; iCurrLevel >= 0; iCurrLevel--)
01790                               {
01791                                     pNext = pCurr->pNext[iCurrLevel];
01792                                     while (pNext)
01793                                     {
01794                                           if ( uiCost > TOTALCOST( pNext ) || (uiCost == TOTALCOST( pNext ) && FARTHER( pNewPtr, pNext ) ) )
01795                                           {
01796                                                 pCurr = pNext;
01797                                                 pNext = pCurr->pNext[iCurrLevel];
01798                                           }
01799                                           else
01800                                           {
01801                                                 break;
01802                                           }
01803                                     }
01804                                     pUpdate[iCurrLevel] = pCurr;
01805                               }
01806                               pCurr = pCurr->pNext[0];
01807                               for (iCurrLevel = 0; iCurrLevel < pNewPtr->bLevel; iCurrLevel++)
01808                               {
01809                                     if (!(pUpdate[iCurrLevel]))
01810                                     {
01811                                           break;
01812                                     }
01813                                     pNewPtr->pNext[iCurrLevel] = pUpdate[iCurrLevel]->pNext[iCurrLevel];
01814                                     pUpdate[iCurrLevel]->pNext[iCurrLevel] = pNewPtr;
01815                               }
01816                               iSkipListSize++;
01817                               if (iSkipListSize > iSkipListLevelLimit[bSkipListLevel])
01818                               {
01819                                     pCurr = pQueueHead;
01820                                     pNext = pQueueHead->pNext[bSkipListLevel - 1];
01821                                     while( pNext )
01822                                     {
01823                                           if (pNext->bLevel > bSkipListLevel)
01824                                           {
01825                                                 pCurr->pNext[bSkipListLevel] = pNext;
01826                                                 pCurr = pNext;
01827                                           }
01828                                           pNext = pNext->pNext[bSkipListLevel - 1];
01829                                     }
01830                                     pCurr->pNext[bSkipListLevel] = pNext;
01831                                     bSkipListLevel++;
01832                               }
01833                         }
01834 
01835 #ifdef PATHAI_SKIPLIST_DEBUG
01836                               // print out contents of queue
01837                               {
01838                                     INT32                   iLoop;
01839                                     INT8                    bTemp;
01840 
01841                                     zTempString[0] = '\0';
01842                                     pCurr = pQueueHead;
01843                                     iLoop = 0;
01844                                     while( pCurr )
01845                                     {
01846                                           sprintf( zTS, "\t%ld", pCurr->sPathNdx );
01847                                           if (pCurr == pNewPtr)
01848                                           {
01849                                                 strcat( zTS, "*" );
01850                                           }
01851                                           strcat( zTempString, zTS );
01852                                           pCurr = pCurr->pNext[0];
01853                                           iLoop++;
01854                                           if (iLoop > 50)
01855                                           {
01856                                                 break;
01857                                           }
01858                                     }
01859                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, zTempString );
01860 
01861 
01862                                     zTempString[0] = '\0';
01863                                     pCurr = pQueueHead;
01864                                     iLoop = 0;
01865                                     while( pCurr )
01866                                     {
01867                                           sprintf( zTS, "\t%d", pCurr->bLevel );
01868                                           strcat( zTempString, zTS );
01869                                           pCurr = pCurr->pNext[0];
01870                                           iLoop++;
01871                                           if (iLoop > 50)
01872                                           {
01873                                                 break;
01874                                           }
01875                                     }
01876                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, zTempString );
01877 
01878                                     zTempString[0] = '\0';
01879                                     bTemp = pQueueHead->bLevel;
01880                                     pCurr = pQueueHead;
01881                                     iLoop = 0;
01882                                     while( pCurr )
01883                                     {
01884                                           bTemp = pQueueHead->bLevel;
01885                                           while ( pCurr->pNext[ bTemp - 1 ] == NULL )
01886                                           {
01887                                                 bTemp--;
01888                                           }
01889                                           sprintf( zTS, "\t%d", bTemp );
01890                                           strcat( zTempString, zTS );
01891                                           pCurr = pCurr->pNext[0];
01892                                           iLoop++;
01893                                           if (iLoop > 50)
01894                                           {
01895                                                 break;
01896                                           }
01897                                     }
01898                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, zTempString );
01899                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "------" );
01900                               }
01901 #endif
01902 
01903                   }
01904 
01905 NEXTDIR:
01906                   if (bLoopState == LOOPING_CLOCKWISE) // backwards
01907                   {
01908                         iCnt = gOneCCDirection[ iCnt ];
01909                   }
01910                   else
01911                   {
01912                         iCnt = gOneCDirection[ iCnt ];
01913                   }
01914                   if ( iCnt == iLoopEnd )
01915                   {
01916 ENDOFLOOP:
01917                         break;
01918                   }
01919                   else if ( fContinuousTurnNeeded && iCnt == gOppositeDirection[ iLoopStart ] )
01920                   {
01921                         fCheckedBehind = TRUE;
01922                   }
01923             }
01924       }
01925       while (pathQNotEmpty && pathNotYetFound);
01926 
01927 
01928       #if defined( PATHAI_VISIBLE_DEBUG )
01929             if (gfDisplayCoverValues && gfDrawPathPoints)
01930             {
01931                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01932                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
01933                   {
01934                         RenderWorld();
01935                         RenderCoverDebug( );
01936                         InvalidateScreen( );
01937                         EndFrameBufferRender();
01938                         RefreshScreen( NULL );
01939                   }
01940             }
01941       #endif
01942 
01943       
01944       // work finished. Did we find a path?
01945       if (pathQNotEmpty && pathFound)
01946       {
01947             INT16 z,_z,_nextLink; //,tempgrid;
01948 
01949             _z=0;
01950             z = (INT16) pQueueHead->pNext[0]->sPathNdx;
01951             
01952             while (z)
01953             {
01954                   _nextLink = trailTree[z].nextLink;
01955                   trailTree[z].nextLink = _z;
01956                   _z = z;
01957                   z = _nextLink;
01958             }
01959 
01960             // if this function was called because a solider is about to embark on an actual route
01961             // (as opposed to "test" path finding (used by cursor, etc), then grab all pertinent
01962             // data and copy into soldier's database
01963             if (bCopy == COPYROUTE)
01964             {
01965               z=_z;
01966               
01967                   for (iCnt=0; z && (iCnt < MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE); iCnt++)
01968               {
01969                     s->usPathingData[iCnt] = (INT16) trailTree[z].stepDir;
01970                   
01971                     z = trailTree[z].nextLink;
01972               }
01973               
01974                   s->usPathIndex = 0;
01975               s->usPathDataSize  = (UINT16) iCnt;
01976 
01977             }
01978             else if (bCopy == NO_COPYROUTE)
01979             {
01980 
01981               z=_z;
01982 
01983                   for (iCnt=0; z != 0; iCnt++)
01984               {
01985                     guiPathingData[ iCnt ] = trailTree[z].stepDir;
01986                   
01987                     z = trailTree[z].nextLink;
01988               }
01989               
01990               giPathDataSize = (UINT16) iCnt;
01991 
01992             }
01993 
01994             #if defined( PATHAI_VISIBLE_DEBUG )
01995                   if (gfDisplayCoverValues && gfDrawPathPoints)
01996                   {
01997                         SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01998                         RenderWorld();
01999                         RenderCoverDebug( );
02000                         InvalidateScreen( );
02001                         EndFrameBufferRender();
02002                         RefreshScreen( NULL );
02003                   }
02004             #endif
02005 
02006             
02007             // return path length : serves as a "successful" flag and a path length counter
02008             #ifdef COUNT_PATHS
02009                   guiSuccessfulPathChecks++;
02010             #endif
02011             gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
02012             gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
02013 
02014             //TEMP:  This is returning zero when I am generating edgepoints, so I am force returning 1 until
02015             //       this is fixed?
02016             if( gfGeneratingMapEdgepoints )
02017             {
02018                   return TRUE;
02019             }
02020 
02021 
02022             return(iCnt);
02023       }
02024 
02025       #ifdef COUNT_PATHS
02026             if (fCopyReachable)
02027             {
02028                   // actually this is a success
02029                   guiSuccessfulPathChecks++;
02030             }
02031             else
02032             {
02033                   guiUnsuccessfulPathChecks++;
02034             }
02035       #endif
02036 
02037       // failed miserably, report...
02038       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
02039       gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
02040       return(0);
02041       //}
02042       //__except(filter(GetExceptionCode(), GetExceptionInformation()))
02043       //{
02044       //    return (0);
02045       //}
02046 }
02047 
02048 void GlobalReachableTest( INT16 sStartGridNo )
02049 {
02050       SOLDIERTYPE s;
02051       INT32 iCurrentGridNo =0;
02052 
02053       memset( &s, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
02054       s.sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
02055       s.bLevel = 0;
02056       s.bTeam = 1;
02057 
02058       //reset the flag for gridno's
02059       for( iCurrentGridNo =0; iCurrentGridNo < WORLD_MAX; iCurrentGridNo++ )
02060       {
02061             gpWorldLevelData[ iCurrentGridNo ].uiFlags &= ~( MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE );
02062       }
02063 
02064       ReconfigurePathAI( ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL, ABSMAX_TRAIL_TREE, ABSMAX_PATHQ );
02065       FindBestPath( &s, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
02066       RestorePathAIToDefaults();
02067 }
02068 
02069 void LocalReachableTest( INT16 sStartGridNo, INT8 bRadius )
02070 {
02071       SOLDIERTYPE s;
02072       INT32 iCurrentGridNo = 0;
02073       INT32 iX, iY;
02074 
02075       memset( &s, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
02076       s.sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
02077 
02078       //if we are moving on the gorund level
02079       if( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL )
02080       {
02081             s.bLevel = 1;
02082       }
02083       else
02084       {
02085             s.bLevel = 0;
02086       }
02087 
02088       s.bTeam = OUR_TEAM;
02089 
02090       //reset the flag for gridno's
02091       for ( iY = -bRadius; iY <= bRadius; iY++ )
02092       {
02093             for ( iX = -bRadius; iX <= bRadius; iX++ )
02094             {
02095                   iCurrentGridNo = sStartGridNo + iX + iY * MAXCOL;
02096                   if ( iCurrentGridNo >= 0 && iCurrentGridNo <= WORLD_MAX )
02097                   {
02098                         gpWorldLevelData[ iCurrentGridNo ].uiFlags &= ~( MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE );
02099                   }
02100             }
02101       }
02102 
02103       // set the dist limit
02104       gubNPCDistLimit = bRadius;
02105       // make the function call
02106       FindBestPath( &s, NOWHERE, s.bLevel, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
02107       // reset dist limit
02108       gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
02109 }
02110 
02111 void GlobalItemsReachableTest( INT16 sStartGridNo1, INT16 sStartGridNo2 )
02112 {
02113       SOLDIERTYPE s;
02114       INT32 iCurrentGridNo =0;
02115 
02116       memset( &s, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
02117       s.sGridNo = sStartGridNo1;
02118       s.bLevel = 0;
02119       s.bTeam = 1;
02120 
02121       //reset the flag for gridno's
02122       for( iCurrentGridNo =0; iCurrentGridNo < WORLD_MAX; iCurrentGridNo++ )
02123       {
02124             gpWorldLevelData[ iCurrentGridNo ].uiFlags &= ~( MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE );
02125       }
02126 
02127       ReconfigurePathAI( ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL, ABSMAX_TRAIL_TREE, ABSMAX_PATHQ );
02128       FindBestPath( &s, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
02129       if ( sStartGridNo2 != NOWHERE )
02130       {
02131             s.sGridNo = sStartGridNo2;
02132             FindBestPath( &s, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
02133       }
02134       RestorePathAIToDefaults();
02135 }
02136 
02137 void RoofReachableTest( INT16 sStartGridNo, UINT8 ubBuildingID )
02138 {
02139       SOLDIERTYPE s;
02140       INT16 sGridNo;
02141 
02142       memset( &s, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
02143       s.sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
02144       s.bLevel = 1;
02145       s.bTeam = 1;
02146 
02147       // clearing flags
02148 
02149       for( sGridNo = 0 ; sGridNo < NOWHERE ; ++sGridNo )
02150             gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
02151       
02152 
02153       gubBuildingInfoToSet = ubBuildingID;
02154 
02155       ReconfigurePathAI( ABSMAX_SKIPLIST_LEVEL, ABSMAX_TRAIL_TREE, ABSMAX_PATHQ );
02156       FindBestPath( &s, NOWHERE, 1, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, 0 );
02157       RestorePathAIToDefaults();
02158 
02159       // set start position to reachable since path code sets it unreachable
02160       gpWorldLevelData[ sStartGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE;
02161 
02162       // reset building variable
02163       gubBuildingInfoToSet = 0;
02164 }

02166 void ErasePath(char bEraseOldOne)
02167 {
02168       INT16 iCnt;
02169 
02170  // NOTE: This routine must be called BEFORE anything happens that changes

02172

02175        if ( gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid )

02178

02180               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS9   );
02181               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS2 );
02182               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS13 );
02183               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS15 );
02184               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS19 );
02185               RemoveTopmost( gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation, FIRSTPOINTERS20 );
02186        }
02187 
02188       if (!gusPathShown)
02189   {
02190    //OldPath = FALSE;
02191    return;
02192   }
02193 
02194 
02195  //if (OldPath > 0 && !eraseOldOne)
02196  //   return;
02197 
02198  //OldPath = FALSE;
02199 
02200 
02201 
02202       gusPathShown = FALSE;
02203 
02204 
02205       for (iCnt=0; iCnt < giPlotCnt; iCnt++)
02206   {
02207             //Grid[PlottedPath[cnt]].fstep = 0;

02222 
02223 
02224 }

02228 
02229 INT16 PlotPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSold, INT16 sDestGridno, INT8 bCopyRoute, INT8 bPlot, INT8 bStayOn, UINT16 usMovementMode, INT8 bStealth, INT8 bReverse , INT16 sAPBudget)
02230 {
02231  INT16 sTileCost,sPoints=0,sTempGrid,sAnimCost=0;
02232  INT16 sPointsWalk=0,sPointsCrawl=0,sPointsRun=0,sPointsSwat=0;
02233  INT16 sExtraCostStand,sExtraCostSwat,sExtraCostCrawl;
02234  INT32 iLastGrid;
02235  INT32 iCnt;
02236  INT16 sOldGrid=0;
02237  INT16 sFootOrderIndex;
02238  INT16 sSwitchValue;
02239  INT16 sFootOrder[5] = {      GREENSTEPSTART, PURPLESTEPSTART, BLUESTEPSTART, 
02240                                                                               ORANGESTEPSTART, REDSTEPSTART };
02241  UINT16     usTileIndex;
02242  UINT16     usTileNum;
02243  LEVELNODE  *pNode;
02244  UINT16 usMovementModeToUseForAPs;
02245  BOOLEAN  bIgnoreNextCost = FALSE;
02246  INT16    sTestGridno;
02247 
02248  if ( bPlot && gusPathShown )
02249  {
02250     ErasePath(FALSE);
02251  }
02252 
02253  gusAPtsToMove     = 0;
02254  sTempGrid               = (INT16) pSold->sGridNo;
02255  
02256  sFootOrderIndex = 0;
02257  
02258 
02259  //gubNPCMovementMode = (UINT8) usMovementMode;
02260  // distance limit to reduce the cost of plotting a path to a location we can't reach
02261 
02262  // For now, use known hight adjustment
02263  if ( gfRecalculatingExistingPathCost || FindBestPath( pSold, sDestGridno, (INT8)pSold->bLevel, usMovementMode, bCopyRoute, 0 ) )
02264  {
02265              // if soldier would be STARTING to run then he pays a penalty since it takes time to 
02266              // run full speed
02267              if (pSold->usAnimState != RUNNING)
02268              {                            
02269                   // for estimation purposes, always pay penalty
02270                   sPointsRun = AP_START_RUN_COST;
02271              }
02272 
02273      // Add to points, those needed to start from different stance!
02274              sPoints += MinAPsToStartMovement( pSold, usMovementMode );
02275 
02276 
02277      // We should reduce points for starting to run if first tile is a fence...
02278              sTestGridno  = NewGridNo(pSold->sGridNo,(INT16) DirectionInc( (UINT16)guiPathingData[0]));
02279      if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sTestGridno ][ (INT8)guiPathingData[0] ][ pSold->bLevel] == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
02280      {
02281           if ( usMovementMode == RUNNING && pSold->usAnimState != RUNNING )
02282           {
02283                 sPoints -= AP_START_RUN_COST;
02284           }
02285      }
02286 
02287             // FIRST, add up "startup" additional costs - such as intermediate animations, etc.
02288 /* removing warning C4060 (jonathanl)
02289             switch(pSold->usAnimState)
02290             {
02291                   //case START_AID   :
02292                   //case GIVING_AID  :    sAnimCost = AP_STOP_FIRST_AID;
02293                   //                                                          break;
02294                   //case TWISTOMACH  :
02295                   //case COLLAPSED   :    sAnimCost = AP_GET_UP;
02296                   //                                                          break;
02297                   //case TWISTBACK   :
02298                   //case UNCONSCIOUS :    sAnimCost = (AP_ROLL_OVER+AP_GET_UP);
02299                   //                                                          break;
02300 
02301                   //    case CROUCHING     :  if (usMovementMode == WALKING || usMovementMode == RUNNING)
02302                   //                                                                            sAnimCost = AP_CROUCH;
02303                   //                                                                break;
02304                   }
02305 */
02306 
02307             sPoints                       += sAnimCost;
02308             gusAPtsToMove += sAnimCost;
02309 
02310 
02311       
02312             
02313 
02314         if (bStayOn)
02315             {
02316                   iLastGrid = giPathDataSize+1;
02317             }
02318             else
02319             {
02320                   iLastGrid = giPathDataSize;
02321             }
02322 
02323    
02324             for ( iCnt=0; iCnt < iLastGrid; iCnt++ )
02325             {     
02326                   sExtraCostStand = 0;
02327                   sExtraCostSwat = 0;
02328                   sExtraCostCrawl = 0;
02329                   // what is the next gridno in the path?
02330                   sOldGrid   = sTempGrid;
02331 
02332                   sTempGrid  = NewGridNo(sTempGrid,(INT16) DirectionInc( (UINT16)guiPathingData[iCnt]));
02333 
02334                   // Get switch value...
02335                   sSwitchValue = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sTempGrid ][ (INT8)guiPathingData[iCnt] ][ pSold->bLevel];
02336 
02337                   // get the tile cost for that tile based on WALKING
02338                   sTileCost = TerrainActionPoints( pSold, sTempGrid, (INT8)guiPathingData[iCnt], pSold->bLevel );
02339 
02340       usMovementModeToUseForAPs = usMovementMode;
02341 
02342       // ATE - MAKE MOVEMENT ALWAYS WALK IF IN WATER
02343           if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGrid ].ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGrid ].ubTerrainID == MED_WATER || gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGrid ].ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER )
02344       {
02345         usMovementModeToUseForAPs = WALKING;
02346       }
02347 
02348       if ( bIgnoreNextCost )
02349       {
02350         bIgnoreNextCost = FALSE;
02351       }
02352       else
02353       {
02354                     // ATE: If we have a 'special cost, like jump fence... 
02355                     if ( sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
02356                     {
02357                           sPoints += sTileCost;
02358 
02359           bIgnoreNextCost = TRUE;
02360 
02361                           // If we are changeing stance ( either before or after getting there....
02362                           // We need to reflect that...
02363                           switch( usMovementModeToUseForAPs )
02364                           {
02365                                 case RUNNING:   
02366                                 case WALKING :
02367 
02368                                       // Add here cost to go from crouch to stand AFTER fence hop....
02369                                       // Since it's AFTER.. make sure we will be moving after jump...
02370                                       if ( ( iCnt + 2 ) < iLastGrid )
02371                                       {
02372                                             sExtraCostStand += AP_CROUCH;
02373 
02374                 // ATE: if running, charge extra point to srart again
02375                 if ( usMovementModeToUseForAPs== RUNNING )
02376                 {
02377                   sExtraCostStand++;
02378                 }
02379 
02380                                 sPoints += sExtraCostStand;              
02381                                       }
02382                                       break;
02383 
02384                                 case SWATTING:  
02385 
02386                                       // Add cost to stand once there BEFORE....
02387                                       sExtraCostSwat += AP_CROUCH;
02388                               sPoints += sExtraCostSwat;              
02389                                       break;
02390 
02391                                 case CRAWLING:  
02392 
02393                                       // Can't do it here.....
02394                                       break;
02395 
02396                           }
02397                     }
02398                     else if (sTileCost > 0)
02399                     {
02400                           // else, movement is adjusted based on mode...
02401 
02402                           if (sSwitchValue == TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING)
02403                           {
02404                                 switch( usMovementModeToUseForAPs )
02405                                 {
02406                                       case RUNNING:   
02407                                       case WALKING :
02408                                             // charge crouch APs for ducking head!
02409                                             sExtraCostStand += AP_CROUCH;
02410                                             break;
02411 
02412                                       default:                    
02413                                             break;
02414                                 }
02415                           }
02416 
02417                           // so, then we must modify it for other movement styles and accumulate
02418                           switch( usMovementModeToUseForAPs )
02419                           {
02420                                 case RUNNING:         sPoints += (INT16)(DOUBLE)( (sTileCost / RUNDIVISOR) ) + sExtraCostStand;     break;
02421                                 case WALKING :  sPoints += (sTileCost + WALKCOST) + sExtraCostStand;        break;
02422                                 case SWATTING:  sPoints += (sTileCost + SWATCOST) + sExtraCostSwat;         break;
02423                                 case CRAWLING:  sPoints += (sTileCost + CRAWLCOST) + sExtraCostCrawl;       break;
02424                                 default      :  sPoints += sTileCost;                                                   break;
02425                           }
02426                     }         
02427       }
02428 
02429                   // THIS NEXT SECTION ONLY NEEDS TO HAPPEN FOR CURSOR UI FEEDBACK, NOT ACTUAL COSTING
02430 
02431                   if (bPlot && ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) ) ) // OR USER OPTION ON... ***)
02432                   {
02433                         // ATE; TODO: Put stuff in here to allow for fact of costs other than movement ( jump fence, open door )
02434 
02435                         // store WALK cost
02436                         sPointsWalk += (sTileCost + WALKCOST) + sExtraCostStand;
02437                   
02438                         // now get cost as if CRAWLING
02439                         sPointsCrawl += (sTileCost + CRAWLCOST) + sExtraCostCrawl; 
02440 
02441                         // now get cost as if SWATTING
02442                         sPointsSwat += (sTileCost + SWATCOST) + sExtraCostSwat;
02443 
02444                         // now get cost as if RUNNING
02445                         sPointsRun += (INT16)(DOUBLE)( (sTileCost / RUNDIVISOR) ) + sExtraCostStand;
02446                   }
02447                   
02448                   if ( iCnt == 0 && bPlot )
02449                   {
02450                         gusAPtsToMove = sPoints;
02451                   
02452                         giPlotCnt = 0;
02453                         
02454                   }
02455 
02456 
02457                   //if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) ) // OR USER OPTION "show paths" ON... ***
02458                   {
02459                         if (bPlot && ((iCnt < (iLastGrid-1)) || (iCnt < iLastGrid && bStayOn)))
02460                         {
02461                               guiPlottedPath[giPlotCnt++] = sTempGrid;
02462 
02463                               // we need a footstep graphic ENTERING the next tile
02464 
02465                               // get the direction
02466                               usTileNum = (UINT16) guiPathingData[iCnt] + 2;
02467                               if (usTileNum > 8)
02468                               {
02469                                     usTileNum = 1;
02470                               }
02471                    
02472                               // Are we a vehicle?
02473                               if ( pSold->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02474                               {                 
02475                                     // did we exceed WALK cost?
02476                                     if ( sPointsSwat > sAPBudget)
02477                                     {
02478                                           sFootOrderIndex = 4;
02479                                     }
02480                                     else
02481                                     {
02482                                           sFootOrderIndex = 3;
02483                                     }
02484                               }
02485                               else
02486                               {
02487                                     // did we exceed CRAWL cost?
02488                                     if (sFootOrderIndex == 0 && sPointsCrawl > sAPBudget)
02489                                     {
02490                                           sFootOrderIndex++;
02491                                     }
02492 
02493                                     // did we exceed WALK cost?
02494                                     if (sFootOrderIndex == 1 && sPointsSwat > sAPBudget)
02495                                     {
02496                                           sFootOrderIndex++;
02497                                     }
02498 
02499                                     // did we exceed SWAT cost?
02500                                     if (sFootOrderIndex == 2 && sPointsWalk > sAPBudget)
02501                                     {
02502                                           sFootOrderIndex++;
02503                                     }
02504 
02505                                     // did we exceed RUN cost?
02506                                     if (sFootOrderIndex == 3 && sPointsRun > sAPBudget)
02507                                     {
02508                                           sFootOrderIndex++;
02509                                     }
02510                               }
02511 
02512                               GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( FOOTPRINTS, (UINT16)usTileNum, &usTileIndex );
02513 
02514                               // Adjust based on what mode we are in...
02515                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02516                               {
02517                                     // find out which color we're using
02518                                     usTileIndex += sFootOrder[ 4 ];
02519                               }
02520                               else // turn based
02521                               {
02522                                     // find out which color we're using
02523                                     usTileIndex += sFootOrder[sFootOrderIndex];
02524                               }
02525 
02526                         
02527                               /*
02528                               if ( sPoints <= sAPBudget)
02529                               {
02530                                     // find out which color we're using
02531                                     usTileIndex += sFootOrder[sFootOrderIndex];
02532                               }
02533                               else
02534                               {
02535                                     // use red footprints ( offset by 16 )
02536                                     usTileIndex += REDSTEPSTART;
02537                               }
02538                               */
02539 
02540                               if ( pSold->bLevel == 0 )
02541                               {
02542                                     pNode = AddObjectToTail(sTempGrid, usTileIndex );
02543                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02544                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02545                               }
02546                               else
02547                               {
02548                                     pNode = AddOnRoofToTail(sTempGrid, usTileIndex );
02549                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02550                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02551                               }
02552                         
02553 
02554 
02555                               // we need a footstep graphic LEAVING this tile
02556 
02557                               // get the direction using the NEXT tile (thus iCnt+1 as index)
02558                               usTileNum = (UINT16) guiPathingData[iCnt + 1] + 2;
02559                               if (usTileNum > 8)
02560                               {
02561                                     usTileNum = 1;                
02562                               }
02563 
02564                               
02565                               // this is a LEAVING footstep which is always the second set of 8
02566                               usTileNum += 8;
02567 
02568                               GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( FOOTPRINTS, (UINT16)usTileNum, &usTileIndex );
02569 
02570                               // Adjust based on what mode we are in...
02571                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02572                               {
02573                                     // find out which color we're using
02574                                     usTileIndex += sFootOrder[ 4 ];
02575                               }
02576                               else // turnbased
02577                               {
02578                                     // find out which color we're using
02579                                     usTileIndex += sFootOrder[sFootOrderIndex];
02580                               }
02581 
02582 
02583 
02584                               if ( pSold->bLevel == 0 )
02585                               {
02586                                     pNode = AddObjectToTail(sTempGrid, usTileIndex );
02587                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02588                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02589                               }
02590                               else
02591                               {
02592                                     pNode = AddOnRoofToTail(sTempGrid, usTileIndex );
02593                                     pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02594                                     pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02595                               }
02596                         }
02597 
02598                   }           // end of if turn based or real-time user option "show paths" on...
02599             }
02600 
02601             if ( bPlot )
02602             {
02603                   gusPathShown = TRUE;
02604             }
02605 
02606  }    // end of found a path
02607 
02608  // reset distance limit 
02609  gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
02610 
02611  return(sPoints);
02612 
02613 }

02615 INT16 UIPlotPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSold, INT16 sDestGridno, INT8 bCopyRoute, INT8 bPlot, INT8 bStayOn, UINT16 usMovementMode, INT8 bStealth, INT8 bReverse , INT16 sAPBudget)
02616 {
02617       // This function is specifically for UI calls to the pathing routine, to 
02618       // check whether the shift key is pressed, etc.
02619       INT16  sRet;
02620 
02621       if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
02622       {
02623             gfPlotDirectPath = TRUE;
02624       }
02625 
02626       // If we are on the same level as the interface level, continue, else return
02627       if ( pSold->bLevel != gsInterfaceLevel )
02628       {     
02629             return( 0 );
02630       }
02631 
02632       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ALWAYS_SHOW_MOVEMENT_PATH ] )
02633       {
02634             bPlot = TRUE;
02635       }
02636 
02637       sRet = PlotPath( pSold, sDestGridno, bCopyRoute, bPlot, bStayOn, usMovementMode, bStealth, bReverse, sAPBudget);
02638       gfPlotDirectPath = FALSE;
02639       return( sRet );
02640 }
02641 
02642 INT16 RecalculatePathCost( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMovementMode )
02643 {
02644       // AI function for a soldier already with a path; this will return the cost of that path using the given movement mode
02645       INT16  sRet;
02646 
02647       if ( !pSoldier->bPathStored || pSoldier->usPathDataSize == 0 )
02648       {
02649             return( 0 );
02650       }
02651 
02652       gfRecalculatingExistingPathCost = TRUE;
02653       sRet = PlotPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, NO_COPYROUTE, FALSE, FALSE, usMovementMode, FALSE, FALSE, 0 );
02654       gfRecalculatingExistingPathCost = FALSE;
02655       return( sRet );
02656 }

02658 INT16 EstimatePlotPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSold, INT16 sDestGridno, INT8 bCopyRoute, INT8 bPlot, INT8 bStayOn, UINT16 usMovementMode, INT8 bStealth, INT8 bReverse , INT16 sAPBudget)
02659 {

02661       // It sets stuff up to ignore all people

02663

02665 
02666       sRet = PlotPath( pSold, sDestGridno, bCopyRoute, bPlot, bStayOn, usMovementMode, bStealth, bReverse, sAPBudget);
02667 
02668       gfEstimatePath = FALSE;
02669       
02670       return( sRet );

02674 UINT8 InternalDoorTravelCost( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT32 iGridNo, UINT8 ubMovementCost, BOOLEAN fReturnPerceivedValue, INT32 * piDoorGridNo, BOOLEAN fReturnDoorCost )
02675 {
02676       // This function will return either TRAVELCOST_DOOR (in place of closed door cost),
02677       // TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE, or the base ground terrain
02678       // travel cost, depending on whether or not the door is open or closed etc.
02679       BOOLEAN                       fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed=FALSE;
02680       INT32                         iDoorGridNo=-1;
02681       DOOR_STATUS *     pDoorStatus;
02682       DOOR *                        pDoor;
02683       STRUCTURE *       pDoorStructure;
02684       BOOLEAN                       fDoorIsOpen;
02685       UINT8                         ubReplacementCost;
02686 
02687       if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
02688       {
02689             ubReplacementCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
02690 
02691             switch( ubMovementCost )
02692             {
02693                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE:
02694                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
02695                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo;
02696                         ubReplacementCost = TRAVELCOST_DOOR;
02697                         break;
02698                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N:
02699                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
02700                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
02701                         ubReplacementCost = TRAVELCOST_DOOR;
02702                         break;
02703                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W:
02704                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = TRUE;
02705                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ WEST ];
02706                         ubReplacementCost = TRAVELCOST_DOOR;
02707                         break;
02708                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE:
02709                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02710                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo;
02711                         break;
02712                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N:
02713                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02714                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
02715                         break;
02716                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NE:
02717                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02718                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTHEAST ];
02719                         break;
02720                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_E:
02721                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02722                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ EAST ];
02723                         break;
02724                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SE:
02725                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02726                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ SOUTHEAST ];
02727                         break;
02728                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_S:
02729                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02730                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ SOUTH ];
02731                         break;
02732                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SW:
02733                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02734                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ SOUTHWEST ];
02735                         break;
02736                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W:
02737                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02738                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ WEST ];
02739                         break;
02740                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW:
02741                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02742                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ];
02743                         break;
02744                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N_N:
02745                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02746                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTH ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
02747                         break;
02748                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_N:
02749                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02750                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
02751                         break;
02752                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NE_N:
02753                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02754                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTHEAST ] + dirDelta[ NORTH ];
02755                         break;
02756                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W_W:
02757                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02758                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ WEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
02759                         break;
02760                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SW_W:
02761                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02762                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ SOUTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
02763                         break;
02764                   case TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_W:
02765                         fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed = FALSE;
02766                         iDoorGridNo = iGridNo + dirDelta[ NORTHWEST ] + dirDelta[ WEST ];
02767                         break;
02768                   default:
02769                         break;
02770             }
02771 
02772             if ( pSoldier && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER || pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ANIMAL) )
02773             {
02774                   // can't open doors!
02775                   ubReplacementCost = TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE;
02776             }
02777 
02778             if (piDoorGridNo)
02779             {
02780                   // return gridno of door through pointer
02781                   *piDoorGridNo = iDoorGridNo;
02782             }
02783 
02784             if ( fReturnPerceivedValue && gpWorldLevelData[ iDoorGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_DOOR_STATUS_PRESENT )
02785             {
02786                   // check door status
02787                   pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( (INT16) iDoorGridNo );
02788                   if (pDoorStatus)
02789                   {
02790                         fDoorIsOpen = (pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_OPEN) != 0;
02791                   }
02792                   else
02793                   {
02794                         // abort!
02795                         return( ubMovementCost );
02796                   }     
02797             }
02798             else
02799             {
02800                   // check door structure
02801                   pDoorStructure = FindStructure( (INT16) iDoorGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
02802                   if (pDoorStructure)
02803                   {
02804                         fDoorIsOpen = (pDoorStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) != 0;
02805                   }
02806                   else
02807                   {
02808                         // abort!
02809                         return( ubMovementCost );
02810                   }
02811             }
02812             // now determine movement cost
02813             if (fDoorIsOpen)
02814             {
02815                   if (fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed)
02816                   {
02817                         ubMovementCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].ubTerrainID ];
02818                   }
02819                   else
02820                   {
02821                         ubMovementCost = ubReplacementCost;
02822                   }
02823             }
02824             else
02825             {
02826                   if (fDoorIsObstacleIfClosed)
02827                   {                       
02828                         // door is closed and this should be an obstacle, EXCEPT if we are calculating
02829                         // a path for an enemy or NPC with keys
02830 
02831                         // creatures and animals can't open doors!
02832                         if ( fReturnPerceivedValue || ( pSoldier && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER || pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ANIMAL ) ) )
02833                         {
02834                               ubMovementCost = ubReplacementCost;
02835                         }
02836                         else
02837                         {                       
02838                               // have to check if door is locked and NPC does not have keys!
02839                               pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( iDoorGridNo );
02840                               if ( pDoor )
02841                               {
02842                                     if ( ( !pDoor->fLocked || (pSoldier && pSoldier->bHasKeys) ) && !fReturnDoorCost )
02843                                     {
02844                                           ubMovementCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].ubTerrainID ];
02845                                     }
02846                                     else
02847                                     {
02848                                           ubMovementCost = ubReplacementCost;
02849                                     }
02850                               }
02851                               else
02852                               {
02853                                     ubMovementCost = ubReplacementCost;
02854                               }
02855                         }
02856                   }
02857                   else
02858                   {
02859                         ubMovementCost = gTileTypeMovementCost[ gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].ubTerrainID ];
02860                   }
02861             }
02862 
02863       }
02864       return( ubMovementCost );
02865 
02866 }
02867 
02868 UINT8 DoorTravelCost( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT32 iGridNo, UINT8 ubMovementCost, BOOLEAN fReturnPerceivedValue, INT32 * piDoorGridNo )
02869 {
02870       return( InternalDoorTravelCost( pSoldier, iGridNo, ubMovementCost, fReturnPerceivedValue, piDoorGridNo, FALSE ) );
02871 }
